channel.title: v on True web artisans
channel.description: Recent content in v on True web artisans

item.title: The V programming language
item.description: Introduction Hello! I’m starting “Good to know” series. And now, I so excited to show you very yong, but simple, fast, safe & compiled programming language called V (or vlang for Google Search bots). Objectives of the article Story of V; Hello World; Main features of language; How to install and update; What’s “V” mean? No, Alexander Medvednikov (author of V programming language) do not fan of “V for Vendetta” movie.
